comment: Select the terrain and furniture you'd like to use from the json directories and fill them in under 'terrain' and 'furniture'
comment2: Using those selections fill in each of the 13 lines with 13 symbols. Blank spaces ' ' will use 'fill_terrain'.
comment3: Be sure to fill in the information above, too.
comment4: 0 is the ground floor. Upper floors are positive and basements and below are negative. (1,0,-1 would have an upper floor and basement)

terrain.comment: The open_air and trashcan are examples to use or delete as you see fit. Follow this pattern when adding more.

place_loot.comment: attempts to place loot randomly from groups of items.

place_monsters.comment: attempts to place monsters randomly from monster groups.
